whyChooseUs.title: Salt Geometrical Lamps Manufacturer & Exporter
whyChooseUs.description: We are a leading manufacturer and exporter of Himalayan salt lamps. Our products are made from 100% natural Himalayan salt crystals that are hand-mined from the Khewra Salt Mines in Pakistan. We offer a wide range of salt lamps in various shapes and sizes to suit your needs. Our salt lamps are known for their soothing glow and air-purifying benefits, making them a popular choice for homes, offices, and spas. Whether you are looking to create a relaxing atmosphere or improve the air quality in your space, our salt lamps are the perfect solution.

faqs.question: How do Himalayan salt lamps work?
faqs.answer: Himalayan salt lamps emit negative ions, which help neutralize pollutants and allergens in the air.

faqs.question: Do salt lamps require maintenance?
faqs.answer: Yes, they should be wiped with a dry cloth and kept away from excessive humidity.

faqs.question: Can I leave my salt lamp on all night?
faqs.answer: Yes, salt lamps are safe to use continuously and can help create a calming atmosphere.

faqs.question: Do Himalayan salt lamps help with allergies?
faqs.answer: Yes, they may help reduce airborne allergens and improve air quality.

faqs.question: Why is my salt lamp leaking water?
faqs.answer: Salt lamps absorb moisture from the air. If they 'sweat,' keep them in a dry place and turn them on more often.
